name: spotify-artists-instagram-follow
title: Follow Spotify Artists on Instagram
description: Follows Instagram accounts from a provided list of URLs with rate limiting and safety measures.

urls.title: Instagram URLs
urls.description: List of Instagram profile URLs to follow (optional if artist_names provided)

artist_names.title: Artist Names
artist_names.description: List of artist names to search for on Instagram and follow

delay_min.title: Minimum Delay (seconds)
delay_min.description: Minimum delay between follows in seconds

delay_max.title: Maximum Delay (seconds)
delay_max.description: Maximum delay between follows in seconds

max_follows.title: Max Follows Per Run
max_follows.description: Maximum number of accounts to follow in this run (safety limit)

headless.title: Run Headless
headless.description: Run browser in headless mode (no visible window)

get_session_id.title: Generate Session ID Only
get_session_id.description: If true, only logs in and returns a session ID (no follow). Used by Groove Gremlin Settings.
